answer: The main "Novartis quarterly financial results" page on the company's website (https://www.novartis.com/investors/financial-data/quarterly-results) is where you can find the collection of financial reports for each quarter of 2024, organized by release date and quarter, through the associated media releases and condensed financial reports.
ground_truth: Novartis 2024年度季度财报系列（Quarterly Financial Results / Financial Data Collection）
